abstract: Gary D. Cohn’s name emerged during a court hearing as prosecutors and lawyers for Rajat K. Gupta, a former Goldman Sachs director, debated the timing of depositions that are set to be taken in a parallel S.E.C. case against Mr. Gupta.
snippet: Gary D. Cohn’s name emerged during a court hearing as prosecutors and lawyers for Rajat K. Gupta, a former Goldman Sachs director, debated the timing of depositions that are set to be taken in a parallel S.E.C. case against Mr. Gupta.
lead_paragraph: Gary D. Cohn, the president of Goldman Sachs, is expected to be interviewed by the government in its insider trading case against Rajat K. Gupta, a former director of the bank.

headline.main: Goldman’s Cohn May Be Interviewed in Gupta Case
